Outcome.Message: The id value specified to indicate what the condition applies to does not reference a procedure, activity, biomedical concept, biomedical concept category, or biomedical concept surrogate - either the specified id is not an id for anything (it is invalid), or the instance identified by the id is not one of the expected classes.
